Reviews.Title: what I would change about this phone
Reviews.Author: Cindy Steve
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. The only thing i would change is the accuracy of the double tap feature. Although this feature is very convenient, it doesn't always work the way it should. I wish the double tap worked 100% of the time. For as much as this phone costs, it should work all the time.Also, the settings can be changed so don't let the "international" part of this phone scare you. I highly reccomend this phone! If you like new amd improved androids, you'll love this!

Reviews.Title: Big Picture
Reviews.Author: Bahston
Reviews.Content: This is not a factory unlocked phone. It displays a merchant's logo upon startup. It also has some silly wallpaper and graphics that seem like they're designed for 12-year-old girls who like pink. Like the big 5.2 inch screen. Lots of the settings and nested menus are non-standard and take a while to get used to. Looks like a cross between the Samsung Galaxy 4 and the HTC One. Hate the buttons on the back....also non-standard and hard to get used to. I suggest you wait for Google and Samsung to come out with their next gen. phones.
